com.azure.android.communication.calling

Class CallOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.communication.calling.CallOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptCallOptions, AcceptTeamsCallOptions, JoinCallOptions, JoinTeamsCallOptions, StartCallOptions, StartTeamsCallOptions

    public abstract class CallOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds options for video and audio
